title: On the Farm
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 47 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 50L
description: On the Farm gives students a glimpse of familiar animals enjoying their favorite places on the farm. Fun illustrations of chickens in the hay, pigs in the mud, and a cow in the barn help students decode two new vocabulary words on each page.
meta: animals, barn, chicken, cow, dog, duck, farm, field, goat, hay, hill, house, mud, pig, pond, sheep
Use the strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Nouns : Identify nouns as naming words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
